repast.simphony.visualization.grid

Class GridShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.piccolo2d.PNode
      • repast.simphony.visualization.grid.GridShape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.print.Printable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class GridShape
extends org.piccolo2d.PNode
    Grid shaped PNode that can convert a point to row, column coordinates.
